name: Catechism
description:
For the 22nd ScoreSpace Jam.

A noir arcade text adventure. 

You are an Angel Inquisitor investigating a new phenomenon in your flying city of Daedalus: angel's wings are becoming black. This event is known as the Falling. Your job is to research this phenomenon and report back to your superiors, meeting all kinds of angels and exploring various unique, randomized paths. Different paths will produce different high scores. Good luck and don't Fall!

Developed by:

Devon's Desk, Liquid Exodus, DanMan27, Tired Mutt
